description: You may imagine a situation, where you have a cloud with heterogeneous hardware configurations, some hosts might have Tesla adapter, some would have large and fast RAID array backend. You may separate them by availability zone, but you can't force a user to stick with a zone within his tenant.
title: Wishlist: Stick tenant to availability zone
